description:
Hozuki, the ever eccentric man, is invited to teach young children about Hell. What could possibly go awry?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La fratrie des renards / Shiro aux urgences
Yakan Kyoudai / Shiro no Shiri ga Dai Pinch
Yakan Siblings / Shiro`s Butt Is in a Real Jam
野干兄妹 / シロの尻が大ピンチ
